attributes.action: give more attention to population control and commercialism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
reasons for teenage pregnancy and obeasity are down to commercialism. it needs to stop.
the population also needs controlling before we have no country left to live in. 
deportation of illegal immigrants, a cap on the amount of immegrants and a limit on the size of a family.
to many people equals to much demand for electric, gas, petrol, food, housing and space. its rediculous.
if we dont tackle this now we will end up living in conditions as cramped as places like hong kong.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
